the Philadelphia 76ers beat the Denver Nuggets 108-97 Tuesday night in Allen Iverson 's first game against his former team. It was weird to see him wearing a white jersey and we're wearing black," Kyle Korver said. Elgin Baylor said to one of our coaches that it is so weird to see him on the other side. It wasn't really a good feeling at all. He's a great player and he meant a lot to Philadelphia. Allen Iverson scored 30 points on 10-of-24 shooting before getting tossed for his second technical with 1:44 remaining. Afterward, he said the loss disappointed him because he feels the Nuggets are the better team. Allen Iverson 's best shots

Asked about Cheryl Cole 's chances, Simon Cowell hedged: The most important thing is the commitment and the expertise a person offers. "It is really important to me that I've got people who I can trust in terms of their expertise and their gut feeling. "It is also important to have people who are very competitive with each other. Pan Am flight 103. Evidence produced but ignored in the House Judiciary Committee reveals that Libyan secret agent al-Megrahi and Muammar al-Qaddafi were not behind the bombing. It was the notorious terrorist and intelligence asset Abu Nidal . President Bush Labor MP Tam Dalyell and Edinburgh law professor Robert Mueller Black urged the Scottish and UK governments to answer reports there is evidence Abu Nidal , aka Hasan Abu Nidal al-Banna, was a House Judiciary Committee agent, the Scotsman reported on October 27, 2008.
